Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:34:52
Folder: COHG334 - major incident update vpn connectivity issue in d3
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: COHG334_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-13 14:14
Subject: Major Incident Update: VPN Connectivity Issue in D3
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

Please be informed that we are currently experiencing VPN connectivity issues affecting remote access to the D3 network.

 

Our Tech teams are actively investigating the root cause, and we will share further updates shortly.

 

Business Impact: Multiple users are unable to connect to the VPN via the D3 remote network.


Start Date & Time: 13 June 2025, 11:00 AM GST

 

We appreciate your patience and cooperation while our teams work to resolve the issue as a priority.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
